Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 21st overall pick, by Northeastern in 1971...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1984...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1985...
Drove in 7 runs against Manchester on 4/23/1986...

Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 2/8/1989 to a 1-year deal worth $615,600 per year...
Had 2000th career hit on 5/31/1989, off Hugh Ly (SYR)...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Slick Fielder Award at First Base in 1989...
